author: The Guardian
title: Eating in Sardinia: send us your travel tips to win a £200 hotel voucher
text:
We’re looking for the best places to eat and drink in Sardinia . Do you know of a fantastic backstreet trattoria, the best place to try local specialities or a great foodie experience at an agriturismo on the island?
Send us your tip – including as much detail as you can (with websites and prices if possible) and why the place is special – and you could win a £200 hotel voucher. Contribute via GuardianWitness .
The best tips will appear in print in next weekend’s Travel section and the winner, chosen by Tom Hall of Lonely Planet, will receive a £200 hotel voucher from Hotels.com , allowing you stay in over 260,000 places worldwide. Submit your tip by clicking on the blue button and using the text tab. Feel free to add a photo if you own the copyright to it – but it’s the text we’ll be judging!
Your tip should be around 100 words long . Terms and conditions .
Closes 29 July 10am GMT
• GuardianWitness is the home of user-generated content on the Guardian. Contribute your video, pictures and stories, and browse news, reviews and creations submitted by others. Posts will be reviewed prior to publication on GuardianWitness, and the best pieces will feature on the Guardian site.
